Changeset.Change: workflow create plan method throws exception

Improved matchmaking for DAG jobs in WorkflowJDLAdaptor: Queries to IS are minimized by finding a set of candidates based on common node requirements of all subtasks performing additional queries only when the requirements differ from the common ones.
Fixed output file names of DAG JDL jobs when FTP storage is selected so that they are uniquely identifiable.
Output store mode option for ftp
Observer now supports execution completion synch
The Hadoop adaptor chokes errors that originate from the job submission, archive creation and output storing operations
Fixed a bug in Grid adaptor which caused problems if job output was not available
Aligned Grid adaptor with the latest gLite wms command arguments
Added support for execution status reporting
Added support to utilize host info for resource matching
Added support to easily retrieve error details for adaptor client users
